entry.title: Making the web go fast with jelly snakes and raspberry twizzlers
entry.summary:
Description

Jack Skinner https://kiwi.pycon.org/schedule/presentation/114/ In this fun & playful session I’ll take you on a journey from HTTP/1.1 to HTTP/2 enjoying the sights & delights of its new features along the way. With features like multiplexing, yesterdays best practices are now tomorrow’s anti-patterns - so what does this mean your app or API? HTTP/2 is changing the game for performance & it’s all explained of course, using jelly snakes & raspberry twizzlers.
